name: Whitii Adventure
description:
The World of Squares is Here with our new Hero WHITII ,Join him in his adventure to discover the three worlds (Square,Triangle and Circle) .

WHITII is a brave white square ,Who's going to fight the three mad kings with his Superpowerful Gun (Banana Gun).

the First world is the world of circles ,Second world is the world of triangles and last world is the world of squares and it is the world of our Hero WHITII .

I hope you guys like this game and show us some Support .

if you have any FeedBack about the game ,

Please Contact me : UU.Soft.Inc@gmail.com
